quote: Don't be sad because sad backwards is das, and das not good.
author: Teddy Deady

quote: suck dick
author: InZidiuZ

quote: Why you haf be mad... it's only game
author: Ilya Bryzgalov

quote: q g eqh qe heq he qh rw bh ewh ew
author: Ralph Ranflas

quote: Just remember, 7 hour support calls aren't a thing anymore!
author: Sia

quote: If you leave your legacy behind, what will you have?
author: Sia

quote: Life without roleplay is a life without fun
author: Sia

quote: I have not failed, I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been
author: George Eliot

quote: Everything you can imagine is real
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure
author: J.K Rowling

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts
author: Winston Churchill

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us
author: Helen Keller

quote: Stay gold, Ponyboy
author: Sia's fav quote ever.

quote: And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one
author: John Lennon

quote: It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain
author: Maya Angelou

quote: A person's a person, no matter how small.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You can't live your life for other people. You've got to do what's right for you, even if it hurts some people you love
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Peace begins with a smile
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse.
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: May you live every day of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past
author: George Orwell

quote: Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Always do what you are afraid to do
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven
author: John Milton

quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: It is so hard to leave—until you leave. And then it is the easiest goddamned thing in the world
author: John Green

quote: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels. Life's a bitch. You've got to go out and kick ass.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Take responsibility of your own happiness, never put it in other people’s hands
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Be the reason someone smiles. Be the reason someone feels loved and believes in the goodness in people
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote:
And, in the end
The love you take
is equal to the love you make
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Accept yourself, love yourself, and keep moving forward. If you want to fly, you have to give up what weighs you down
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don’t respect, appreciate, and value you
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform'- Roy T. Bennett
But I know, somehow, that only when it is dark enough can you see the stars
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Big brother is always watching
author: Twoot

quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.
author: Yoda

quote: Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. Consume you, it will.
author: Yoda

quote: Always pass on what you have learned.
author: Yoda

quote: Patience you must have my young Padawan.
author: Yoda

quote: In a dark place we find ourselves, and a little more knowledge lights our way.
author: Yoda

quote: Death is a natural part of life. Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. Mourn them do not. Miss them do not. Attachment leads to jealously. The shadow of greed, that is.
author: Yoda

quote: Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.
author: Yoda

quote: You will find only what you bring in.
author: Yoda

quote: Difficult to see. Always in motion is the future.
author: Yoda

quote: To answer power with power, the Jedi way this is not. In this war, a danger there is, of losing who we are.
author: Yoda

quote: Many of the truths that we cling to depend on our point of view.
author: Yoda

quote: Named must your fear be before banish it you can.
author: Yoda

quote: Soon will I rest, yes, forever sleep. Earned it I have. Twilight is upon me, soon night must fall.
author: Yoda

quote: When you look at the dark side, careful you must be. For the dark side looks back.
author: Yoda

quote: Smaller in number are we, but larger in mind.
author: Yoda

quote: Always two there are, no more, no less. A master and an apprentice.
author: Yoda

quote: If no mistake you have made, losing you are. A different game you should play.
author: Yoda

quote: Happens to every guy sometimes this does
author: Yoda
